thread.section_title: Government Policy, Business and Technology: i360 Gov
thread.title: ICD-10: Inside the war rooms

title: ICD-10: Inside the war rooms
text:
02 ICD-10: Inside the war rooms 
Healthcare IT News: Within a Washington DC-area consultancy, employees are gathering early in what the agency has demarcated as the war room. Some hospitals, meanwhile, have established a command center for triage, while a major consultancy is taking the "virtual command center" approach, and a cloud-based EHR vendor is deploying foot soldiers to practices in several states on both U.S. coasts.
